column4: i have a really bothering problem, when i download something ( tar.gz ) archive manager opens. But i just want to save it, any ideas ? ( I have tried both epiphany and firefox )
right click, "save link as", or something similar, i guess
nah, it isnt that easy. It must be builtin somehow, that when it discoverers a tar.gz file it automatically executes archive manager. But i dont want that...
